ygData.subject: Necros soloing (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: The other day I was in Cazic deep in the sewers with a pretty good pickup group.  I was the lowest at 31st level.  We only had five people in the group so when
ygData.messageBody:
The other day I was in Cazic deep in the sewers with a pretty good pickup
group. I was the lowest at 31st level. We only had five people in the
group so when a 34 necro shouted he wanted to join a party I told him we had
a spot. When the necro joined the party, he told us that that he had almost
no experience fighting in groups before. He stated that he had soloed all
the way from 1st level to 34th level and only had 10 days played time. He
stated that only now since he was at 34th did he find it necessary to join
groups to get good EXP. I have heard that necros were the best at soloing
so I had trouble believing what he said. I am 31st level with 29 days
played time. A friend of mine is a 36 enchanter with 50 days played time.
Someone in the party asked him if he had friends that helped him powerlevel
to 34th. He said that he had done it all by himself and that he just knew
the right places to camp. Does this sound credible that a necro can solo to
34th in only 10 days played time?

Galtin of E'ci
